channel.title: Learning on Pages
channel.description: Recent content in Learning on Pages

item.title: Trying out the Ergo blockchain environment
item.description: Started with this page https://docs.ergoplatform.com/node/install/ to install a ergo node but it quickly turned into 2 days of searching for alternatives and tutorials.

item.title: Learning blockchain programming
item.description: In the last couple of months I became curious about what makes a crypto currency work, and why I see more and more news about the technology behind it, promoting it as the future solution to so many problems. How does blockchain work?
